wikipedia_page.main: Philip Charles Holme (born 21 June 1947) was a Welsh amateur football forward who played in the Football League for Hull City and Swansea City. He was capped by Wales at amateur level.

response: ! scope="col" style="width:10%;" |Goals9 players finished their amateur international careers with 3 goals – G. Davies, K. Davies, L.O. Davies, M. Griffiths, Phil Holme, Sam Jones, Gilbert Lloyd, Peter Rees and T. Reynolds.
